# cmccloudv2_autoscaling_az_policy (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create AZ policy
resource "cmccloudv2_autoscaling_az_policy" "az_policy1" {  
    name  = "as_group1_az_policy"
    zones = [ "AZ1" ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the autoscaling AZ policy
- `zones` (Set of String) The zones of the autoscaling AZ policy

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
